mapper.select: select no, title, content, g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth, member_no as userNo from board where no = #{no }

choose.when: insert into board values (seq_board.nextval, #{title }, #{content }, sysdate, 0, nvl((select max(g_no) from board),0) + 1, 1, 1, #{userNo })

mapper.select:
select count(*) from board
where title like '%${_parameter }%' or content like '%${_parameter }%'

choose.when: select * from ( select no, title, hit, reg_date as regDate, depth, name as userName, member_no as userNo, rownum as rn from ( select a.no, a.title, a.hit, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as reg_date, a.depth, b.name, a.member_no from board a, member b where a.member_no = b.no and ( a.title like '%${keyword }%' or a.content like '%${keyword }%' ) order by g_no desc, o_no asc ) ) where (#{page }-1)*#{size }+1 <= rn and rn <= #{page }*#{size }
choose.otherwise: select * from ( select no, title, hit, reg_date as regDate, depth, name as userName, member_no as userNo, rownum as rn from ( select a.no, a.title, a.hit, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as reg_date, a.depth, b.name, a.member_no from board a, member b where a.member_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc ) ) where (#{page }-1)*#{size }+1 <= rn and rn <= #{page }*#{size }
